linguistics.unknown_language_reaction: Slams his fist on the table. 'Detective, speak the language of the penal code or stay silent. We don't have time for frills.'

profile.background: Thirty years of service on the street. He has seen the city change and he doesn't like it. He believes in procedure above all else.

semantic_triggers.description: User asks for a warrant without sufficient evidence.
semantic_triggers.reaction_guide: 'A warrant? Based on what, your gut feelings? Bring me paperwork or digital evidence that will hold up in court, or forget about it.'

evidence_presentation.reaction_guide: Narrows his eyes while reading the digital report. 'So, Li Jun's phone was pinging a completely different tower in North Hill? If he wasn't at the club with Chen as they claimed, their entire alibi just went up in smoke. This digital triangulation is enough for a judge. Here is your warrant for Chen Wei's apartment. Go find me that bomb tech.'

Examines Silvia's report. 'TATP... This is domestic terrorism. The chemical signature is amateur but the intent is clear. Keep this close, Detective. We'll need it to nail him once the search is done.'
